petitFute: Top-of-the-range materials, designer furniture, super cozy rooms, brand new kitchen and bathroom equipment, outdoor spa: the Residence Les Merisiers is the perfect place for spending exceptional holidays in a tasteful setting!

descriptions.region: Want to go out but you don't know where? No problem ! Here is a list of our favorites and our suggestions for things to do in Alsace.
descriptions.guide: Here, you will find all the information you need for your stay in Les Merisiers.
descriptions.construction: Les Merisiers are the result of two years of work, and you can admire below the progress of the work and the resulting transformation.
